sentence.Network_en: The phage has replicated and the donor cells have lysed.

sentence.Network_en: Lysogeny is a semi - permanent association between the phage and host chromosomes.

sentence.Network_en: Phage chromosome is inserted into the continuity of the bacterial chromosome.
sentence.Network_cn: 噬菌体染色体被插入细菌染色体中.

means.word_mean: 1. a virus that is parasitic in bacteria; it uses the bacterium's machinery and energy to produce more phage until the bacterium is destroyed and phage is released to invade surrounding bacteria
